description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Evelina, the Pauper's Child: or Poverty, crime, and sorrow. A romance ... by the author of “Ela the Outcast” [i.e. Thomas Peckett Prest], etc. [With illustrations.]" Contributor: PREST, Thomas Peckett. Lloyd Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001179824 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
